control.label: Trailer search language for better results
Hide Trailer Button for movies (Trailer Search Button remains visible!)
[COLOR=red]![/COLOR] Enter your OMDB/TMDB API keys for retrieval of rt/mc/imdb ratings + budgets.
Open [COLOR=firebrick]AutoCompletion for virtual keyboard[/COLOR] Settings Dialog [Shortcut]
[COLOR=red]![/COLOR] Configure AutoCompletion language for virtual keyboard.[CR] Recommended setting: google + your language code
Hide some view types for simplicity (Enable = Only show Lists + Wall Views)
Switch Wall Views (Enable = Wall View with more items becomes Default Wall)
[Video OSD] Hide some buttons for simplicity (rewind/fforward)
[Video OSD] Automatically pause/resume playback when using INFO button
[Video Info Dialog] Show movie file name (Default: On)
Show mouse control buttons if mouse input enabled (Default: Off)
Enable Idle Timer for Home Screen UI Fade Out
[COLOR=red]![/COLOR] EXPERIMENTAL SECTION (use at your own RISK)
Show logo-screen while in progress of shutdown/reboot/logout
Fade In Kodi UI on Startup
– Show madVR logo on startup screen
Enable Kiosk Mode (Hides: Sub menus, Sidebar menus)
[COLOR=firebrick]Note: Audio Passthrough has to be DISABLED before using this![/COLOR]
Auto-enable Dynamic Range Compression, but ONLY for MOVIES in your DB
– Hide Dynamic Range Compression toggle in VideoOSD
Look for .nts files containing internal notes
Move "$LOCALIZE[1036]" to beginning of main menu
